bookTitle: Feisty & Feminine: A Rallying Cry for Conservative Women
Plot: CEO and President of Concerned Women for America, Penny Young Nance is the new face of an emerging brand of conservative women who are tired of the political prattle, and she is ready to change the way women are portrayed. In her debut title Relevant, she takes an honest look at what it means to be a conservative woman with thoughtful beliefs that are increasingly relevant in todayâ€™s valueless world.
